Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the ID of the delegated Security Hub administrator account. The format is accountID/Region. For example, 123456789012/us-west-2.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The ID of the delegated Security Hub administrator account, in the format of accountID/Region.
Whether the delegated Security Hub administrator is set for the organization.
